content: काष्ठं [काश्-क्थन् <ls>Uṇ. 2. 2</ls>] {@--1@} A piece of wood, especially one used as fuel; <ls>Ms. 4. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">241</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 69.</ls> {@--2@} Wood or timber, a piece or log of wood in general; यथा काष्ठं च काष्ठं च समेयातां महोदधौ <ls>H. 4. 69</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 49.</ls> {@--3@} A stick; <ls>Y. 2. 218.</ls> {@--4@} An instrument for measuring length.
